name: HungrySlimes
description:
Nice short platformer game. Made for a local gamejam  with the theme of "keep growing".

SPOILERS

Control a slime that just cant stop eating, eat as much as you can to open the doors that block the portal. If the players hungerbar depletes completely, you will die. Levels get trickier and trickier the more you progress, both mentally and mechanically.

Food both feeds and fattens the player.

You can spit out your fat which makes you skinny again, fat can be recollected after being spat. You can do this to become faster and smaller temporally to reach areas you couldnt while being fat  

Red slimes will try to kill you if they are bigger than you, otherwise they will run away from you as you can eat them

Doors open or close depending on how fat or skinny you are, doors with a triangle pointing up requires you to become fat to open (amount shown by progress bar)

Doors with a triangle pointing down requires you to become skinny to open (amount shown by progress bar)

There are currently only 10 levels, gl.
